title: Fortigate 10-G docs
introduction: The FortiGate Security Appliance (FSA) 10 Gbps is a single tenant (dedicated), self-managed, high throughput (10 Gbps) hardware firewall. It includes next-generation features, such as antivirus, intrusion prevention, and web filtering.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with FortiGate Security Appliance 10 Gbps
section_recommended.description: The FortiGate Security Appliance (FSA) 10 Gbps is a hardware firewall that can be configured to protect traffic on multiple VLANs for both public and private networks.

section_recommended.title: Viewing all firewalls
section_recommended.description: You can see a list of the current FortiGate Security Appliance 10 Gbps firewalls that are associated with your account by using the instructions here.

section_recommended.title: Managing firewall device details
section_recommended.description: You can see the device details for a FortiGate Security Appliance 10 Gbps by clicking the link for the device under the Firewall Name column. This link directs you to the Device Overview page.
